When <S%G2532><s%> they saw <S%G1492><s%> it, <S%G537><s%> they all murmured, <S%G1234><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3754><s%> "He has gone <S%G1525><s%> in to lodge <S%G2647><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> who is a sinner. <S%G268><s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> Zacchaeus <S%G2195><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> half <S%G2255><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> goods <S%G5224><s%> I give <S%G1325><s%> to the poor. <S%G4434><s%> <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> I have wrongfully <S%G4811><s%> exacted <S%G4811><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%> of anyone, <S%G591><s%> I restore four times as much. <S%G5073><s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Today, <S%G4594><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> has come <S%G1096><s%> to this <S%G5129><s%> house, <S%G3624><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G2530><s%> he <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> a son <S%G5207><s%> of Abraham. <S%G11><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to seek <S%G2212><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> that which <S%G3588><s%> was lost. <S%G622><s%>"

He said <S%G2036><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> "A <S%G5100><s%> certain <S%G444><s%> nobleman <S%G2104><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a far <S%G3117><s%> country <S%G5561><s%> to receive <S%G2983><s%> for himself <S%G1438><s%> a kingdom, <S%G932><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to return. <S%G5290><s%>

"It <S%G2532><s%> happened <S%G1096><s%> when <S%G1722><s%> he had <S%G846><s%> come back <S%G1880><s%> again, <S%G2983><s%> having received the kingdom, <S%G932><s%> that <S%G2532><s%> he commanded <S%G2036><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> servants, <S%G1401><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> he had given <S%G1325><s%> the money, <S%G694><s%> to be called <S%G5455><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he might know <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> they <S%G5101><s%> had gained by conducting business. <S%G1281><s%>

The <S%G1161><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> came <S%G3854><s%> before him, <S%G3004><s%> saying, <S%G2962><s%> 'Lord, your <S%G4675><s%> mina <S%G3414><s%> has made ten <S%G1176><s%> more <S%G4333><s%> minas. <S%G3414><s%>'

<S%G2532><s%> "The <S%G2532><s%> second <S%G1208><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G4675><s%> 'Your mina, <S%G2962><s%> Lord, has made <S%G4160><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> minas. <S%G3414><s%>'
"So <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to him, <S%G5129><s%> <S%G2532><s%> 'And you <S%G4771><s%> are <S%G1096><s%> to be <S%G2532><s%> over <S%G1883><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> cities. <S%G4172><s%>'

<S%G2532><s%> Another <S%G2087><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G2962><s%> 'Lord, behold, <S%G2400><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> mina, <S%G3414><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I kept <S%G2192><s%> laid away <S%G606><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a handkerchief, <S%G4676><s%>

for <S%G1063><s%> I feared <S%G5399><s%> you, <S%G4571><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> an exacting <S%G840><s%> man. <S%G444><s%> You take up <S%G142><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> which you didn't <S%G3756><s%> lay <S%G5087><s%> down, <S%G5087><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> reap that <S%G3739><s%> which you <S%G4687><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> sow. <S%G4687><s%>'

<S%G1063><s%> 'For I tell <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> to everyone <S%G3956><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> has, <S%G2192><s%> will more be given; <S%G1325><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> from <S%G575><s%> him <S%G3588><s%> who doesn't <S%G3361><s%> have, <S%G2192><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> which he has <S%G2192><s%> will be taken away <S%G142><s%> from <S%G575><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Having <S%G2036><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things, <S%G4198><s%> he went on ahead, <S%G1715><s%> going up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%>

It <S%G2532><s%> happened, <S%G1096><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> he drew near <S%G1448><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Bethsphage <S%G967><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Bethany, <S%G963><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the mountain <S%G3735><s%> that is called <S%G2564><s%> Olivet, <S%G1636><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%>

Those <S%G1161><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> were sent went <S%G649><s%> away, <S%G1161><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> things just as <S%G2531><s%> he had told <S%G2036><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

As <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> went, <S%G4198><s%> they spread <S%G5291><s%> their <S%G846><s%> cloaks <S%G2440><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the way. <S%G3598><s%>

As <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was now <S%G2235><s%> getting near, <S%G1448><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the descent <S%G2600><s%> of the Mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives, <S%G1636><s%> the whole <S%G537><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to rejoice <S%G5463><s%> and praise <S%G134><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the mighty works <S%G1411><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they had seen, <S%G1492><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is the King <S%G935><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord! <S%G2962><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the highest! <S%G5310><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> rebuke <S%G2008><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> disciples! <S%G3101><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> When <S%G5613><s%> he drew near, <S%G1448><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> and wept <S%G2799><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> it, <S%G846><s%>

saying, <S%G3754><s%> "If <S%G1487><s%> you, <S%G2532><s%> even you, <S%G2532><s%> had known <S%G1097><s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3778><s%> <S%G4675><s%> today <S%G2250><s%> the <S%G1065><s%> things <S%G3588><s%> which belong to <S%G4314><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> peace! <S%G1515><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> now, <S%G3568><s%> they are hidden <S%G2928><s%> from <S%G575><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> eyes. <S%G3788><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> will come <S%G2240><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> you, <S%G4571><s%> when <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%> will throw <S%G4016><s%> up a barricade <S%G5482><s%> against you, <S%G4671><s%> <S%G2532><s%> surround <S%G4033><s%> you, <S%G4571><s%> <S%G4033><s%> <S%G2532><s%> hem <S%G4912><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> in <S%G4912><s%> on every side, <S%G3840><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> will dash <S%G1474><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G4671><s%> to the ground. <S%G1474><s%> They <S%G2532><s%> will <S%G863><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> leave <S%G863><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G4671><s%> one stone <S%G3037><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> another, <S%G3037><s%> because <S%G473><s%> you <S%G3739><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> of your <S%G4675><s%> visitation. <S%G1984><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to drive out <S%G1544><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> bought <S%G59><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sold <S%G4453><s%> in it, <S%G1722><s%>
